title: Resources to support you
cleaned_text: Resources to support you Updated February 11, 2022 The COVID-19 vaccine is now available for anyone living or working in Alaska who is age 5 or older, however please note that resources are still in the process of being updated to reflect recent changes in vaccine eligibility. Updated information will be be posted soon. COVID-19 vaccine pages [Alaska COVID-19 Vaccine Main Page](vaccine.aspx) Ordering, storage and handling Ordering and transferring [How to order COVID-19 vaccine (PDF)](../../SiteAssets/Pages/HumanCoV/Order_COVID_Vaccine.pdf) [Transfer vaccine form (PDF)](../../SiteAssets/Pages/HumanCoV/COVID_Transfer_Form.pdf) [COVID Vaccine Temperature Excursion Report (PDF)](../../SiteAssets/Pages/HumanCoV/COVID_Temp_Excursion_Report.pdf) Storage and handling [Vaccine Handling Toolkit](https://www.usp.org/covid-19/vaccine-handling-toolkit) [How to Reconcile and Return Spoiled COVID-19 Vaccine Doses (PDF)](../../SiteAssets/Pages/HumanCoV/Return_COVID_Doses.pdf) [Temperature Monitoring for Ultra-Cold in Fahrenheit (PDF)](../../SiteAssets/Pages/HumanCoV/Pfizer_TempLog_ULTRACOLDStorage_Fahrenheit.pdf) [Temperature Monitoring for Ultra-Cold in Celsius (PDF)](./../SiteAssets/Pages/HumanCoV/Pfizer_TempLog_ULTRACOLDStorage_Celsius.pdf) [Temperature Monitoring for Freezer in Fahrenheit (PDF)](../../SiteAssets/Pages/HumanCoV/COVID_FreezerTempLogs.pdf) [Temperature Monitoring for Freezer in Celsius (PDF)](../../SiteAssets/Pages/HumanCoV/COVID_FreezerTempLogs_C.pdf) [Temperature Monitoring for Refrigerator in Fahrenheit (PDF)](../../SiteAssets/Pages/HumanCoV/COVID_RefrigeratorTempLogs.pdf) [Temperature Monitoring for Refrigerator in Celsius (PDF)](../../SiteAssets/Pages/HumanCoV/COVID_RefrigeratorTempLogs_C.pdf) [Dry Ice Safety (PDF)](../../SiteAssets/Pages/HumanCoV/DryIceSafety.pdf) [Vaccine Administration and Storage and Handling Guide (CDC)](https://www.cdc.gov/vaccines/hcp/admin/downloads/vacc-admin-storage-guide.pdf) [Janssen Vaccine Storage and Handling Summary](https://www.cdc.gov/vaccines/covid-19/info-by-product/janssen/downloads/janssen-storage-handling-summary.pdf) [Janssen Vaccine Storage and Handling Labels](https://www.cdc.gov/vaccines/covid-19/info-by-product/janssen/downloads/janssen-storage-handling-label.pdf) - Janssen [Transport Guidance Summary](https://www.cdc.gov/vaccines/covid-19/info-by-product/janssen/downloads/janssen-transportation-guidance.pdf) - Janssen [Transport Temperature Log](https://www.cdc.gov/vaccines/covid-19/downloads/transport-temperature-log.pdf) Dispensing clinic materials [Pediatric COVID-19 Vaccine Playbook (PDF)](../../siteassets/pages/HumanCoV/pediatricCOVID19vaccine.pdf) [Vaccine Eligibility Attestation and Script (PDF)](../../SiteAssets/Pages/HumanCoV/COVIDvaccineAttestationEligibility.pdf) Providers need to sign and return this form to their TAA stating that they will confirm vaccine recipientâ€s eligibility. [Printed material order form (PDF)](../../SiteAssets/Pages/HumanCoV/COVID_Order_Form.pdf) [COVID-19 vaccine consent form (PDF)](../../SiteAssets/Pages/HumanCoV/COVID_Vaccine_Consent.pdf) [See communications toolkit for more materials](#toolkit) Patient safety [Reporting adverse events to the Vaccine Adverse Event Reporting System (VAERS)](https://vaers.hhs.gov/) [Anaphylaxis handout (PDF)](../../SiteAssets/Pages/HumanCoV/Covid_anaphylaxis_flyer.pdf) [Interim Considerations: Preparing for the Potential Management of Anaphylaxis at COVID-19 Vaccination Sites (CDC)](https://www.cdc.gov/vaccines/covid-19/info-by-product/pfizer/anaphylaxis-management.html) [12 things Jurisdictions Need to Know About VAERS (PDF)](../../SiteAssets/Pages/HumanCoV/Fact%20Sheet_12-things-jurisdictions-need-to-know-about-vaers_Feb2021.pdf) [Vaccine safety application, V-Safe, information sheet (PDF)](../../SiteAssets/Pages/HumanCoV/v-safe-information-sheet.pdf)(Will be provided in printed form with supplies) [Vaccine safety application, V-Safe, poster (PDF)](../../SiteAssets/Pages/HumanCoV/v-safe-poster.pdf)(Will be provided in printed form with supplies) [V-Safe flyer and info sheet now available in Korean, Spanish, Simplified Chinese, and Vietnamese](https://www.cdc.gov/coronavirus/2019-ncov/vaccines/safety/vsafe/printresources.html) [V-Safe FAQ](https://www.cdc.gov/coronavirus/2019-ncov/vaccines/safety/faq.html) Stay informed about vaccines Guidance The CDC COVID-19 Vaccination Program Provider Agreement expressly incorporates all recommendations, requirements, and other guidance that the agreement specifically identifies. Organizations must monitor such identified guidance for updates. Organizations must comply with such updates. Updates will be posted on the following webpages: [CDC Covid-19 Vaccine Information (CDC)](https://www.cdc.gov/vaccines/covid-19/index.html) [ACIP Vaccine Recommendations and (CDC)](https://www.cdc.gov/vaccines/hcp/acip-recs/index.html) [Immunization Information Systems (CDC)](http://www.cdc.gov/vaccines/programs/iis/index.html) [Pfizer-BioNTech COVID-19 Vaccine Resources](https://www.cvdvaccine-us.com/) Product information by vaccine -
